name: application_id
description: Primary Key - Unique ID for each application

name: application_date
description: Date the application was submitted

name: application_link
description: html link to the job description

name: company_name
description: Company name of hiring

name: job_title
description: Job Title

name: location
description: Location of Company Headquarters

name: office_participation
description: In-Office|Hybrid|Remote - How does the company expect the applicate to work

name: role_desc
description: Full text description of the role

name: responsibilities
description: Full text description of the responsibilities

name: requirements
description: Full text description of the requirements

name: pay_min
description: Minimum pay if suggested range is listed

name: pay_max
description: Maximum pay if suggested range is listed

name: cv_version
description: Path to cv

name: cover_letter
description: Path to cover letter

name: self_assessment
description: Self grade assesment of the fit between skills and responsibilitis. 0-100 by 5

name: core_skills
description: A list of strings representing specific skills and tools needed for the role

name: llm
description: Does the job require familarity with setting up or fine tuning LLM or anothes GenAI product?

name: mmm
description: Does the job require familarity with Marketing Mix Modeling?

name: marketing
description: Does the job require familarity with Marketing data?

name: retail
description: Does the job require familarity with retail data such as inventory planning?

name: healthcare
description: Does the job require familarity with Healthcare data?

name: finance
description: Does the job require familarity with Finance data?

name: senior_role
description: Is the role considered Senior

name: staff_role
description: Is the role considered Staff level?

name: generalist_role
description: Is the role expected to handle all general data science issues?

name: management_role
description: Does the role require people management?

name: refferal
description: Did a personal connection provide a refferal to the organization and/or hiring manager?

name: recruiter
description: Was the application initiated by a recruiter reaching out?

name: application_source
description: Where was the job listing posted?

name: recruiter_screen
description: Has a recruiter screen been scheduled or completed?

name: recruiter_screen_date
description: The date of the recruiter screen

name: hiring_manager_screen
description: Has a hiring manager screen been scheduled or completed?

name: hiring_manager_screen_date
description: The date of the hiring manager screen

name: technical_screen
description: Has a technical screen been scheduled or completed?

name: technical_screen_date
description: The date of the technical sreen

name: offer
description: Has an offer of employment happened?

name: offer_date
description: Date of offer of employment

name: rejection
description: Has the application been rejected?

name: rejection_date
description: The date of the application rejection

name: technical_screen_type
description: interview|test|task how the technical screen is conducted

name: technical_screen_time
description: amount of time in minutes spent on technical screen

name: created_at
description: Datetime when record was created

name: updated_at
description: Datetime when record was last updated
